entries.message: Game rules have been moved into a registry and renamed from camel case names to resource locations in snake case.
entries.fullLine: gamerule breaking | Game rules have been moved into a registry and renamed from camel case names to resource locations in snake case.

entries.message: The following game rules have been renamed: `announceAdvancements` to `show_advancement_messages`, `commandBlocksEnabled` to `command_blocks_work`, `command_modification_block_limit` to `max_block_modifications`, `disableElytraMovementCheck` to `elytra_movement_check` (value inverted), `disablePlayerMovementCheck` to `player_movement_check` (value inverted), `disableRaids` to `raids` (value inverted), `doDaylightCycle` to `advance_time`, `doEntityDrops` to `entity_drops`, `doImmediateRespawn` to `immediate_respawn`, `doInsomnia` to `spawn_phantoms`, `doLimitedCrafting` to `limited_crafting`, `doMobLoot` to `mob_drops`, `doMobSpawning` to `spawn_mobs`, `doPatrolSpawning` to `spawn_patrols`, `doTileDrops` to `block_drops`, `doTraderSpawning` to `spawn_wandering_traders`, `doVinesSpread` to `spread_vines`, `doWardenSpawning` to `spawn_wardens`, `doWeatherCycle` to `advance_weather`, `maxCommandChainLength` to `max_command_sequence_length`, `maxCommandForkCount` to `max_command_forks`, `naturalRegeneration` to `natural_health_regeneration`, `snowAccumulationHeight` to `max_snow_accumulation_height`, `spawnRadius` to `respawn_radius`, and `spawnerBlocksEnabled` to `spawner_blocks_work`.
entries.fullLine: gamerule breaking | The following game rules have been renamed: `announceAdvancements` to `show_advancement_messages`, `commandBlocksEnabled` to `command_blocks_work`, `command_modification_block_limit` to `max_block_modifications`, `disableElytraMovementCheck` to `elytra_movement_check` (value inverted), `disablePlayerMovementCheck` to `player_movement_check` (value inverted), `disableRaids` to `raids` (value inverted), `doDaylightCycle` to `advance_time`, `doEntityDrops` to `entity_drops`, `doImmediateRespawn` to `immediate_respawn`, `doInsomnia` to `spawn_phantoms`, `doLimitedCrafting` to `limited_crafting`, `doMobLoot` to `mob_drops`, `doMobSpawning` to `spawn_mobs`, `doPatrolSpawning` to `spawn_patrols`, `doTileDrops` to `block_drops`, `doTraderSpawning` to `spawn_wandering_traders`, `doVinesSpread` to `spread_vines`, `doWardenSpawning` to `spawn_wardens`, `doWeatherCycle` to `advance_weather`, `maxCommandChainLength` to `max_command_sequence_length`, `maxCommandForkCount` to `max_command_forks`, `naturalRegeneration` to `natural_health_regeneration`, `snowAccumulationHeight` to `max_snow_accumulation_height`, `spawnRadius` to `respawn_radius`, and `spawnerBlocksEnabled` to `spawner_blocks_work`.

entries.message: In the `game_rules` test environment, the keys `bool_rule` and `int_rule` have been replaced with a single `rules` key. It is a map from game rule resource locations to values (integer or boolean depending on the game rule).
entries.fullLine: game-test breaking | In the `game_rules` test environment, the keys `bool_rule` and `int_rule` have been replaced with a single `rules` key. It is a map from game rule resource locations to values (integer or boolean depending on the game rule).

entries.message: Renamed `visual/water_fog_radius` Environment Attribute to `visual/water_fog_end_distance`.
entries.fullLine: environment-attribute breaking | Renamed `visual/water_fog_radius` Environment Attribute to `visual/water_fog_end_distance`.

entries.message: Removed `visual/extra_fog` Environment Attribute.
entries.fullLine: environment-attribute breaking | Removed `visual/extra_fog` Environment Attribute.

entries.message: Replaced `visual/cloud_opacity` Environment Attribute with `visual/cloud_color`.
entries.fullLine: environment-attribute breaking | Replaced `visual/cloud_opacity` Environment Attribute with `visual/cloud_color`.

entries.message: Removed `contents` as a supported value for dynamic loot entry type. Its behavior is now replicated by the `slots` loot entry type with `slot_range` slot source.
entries.fullLine: loot breaking obsolete | Removed `contents` as a supported value for dynamic loot entry type. Its behavior is now replicated by the `slots` loot entry type with `slot_range` slot source.

entries.message: Removed `item.underwater_saddle.equip` sound event.
entries.fullLine: sound breaking | Removed `item.underwater_saddle.equip` sound event.

entries.message: Data pack format has been increased to `93.0`.
entries.fullLine: pack breaking obsolete | Data pack format has been increased to `93.0`.

entries.message: Resource pack format has been increased to `73.0`.
entries.fullLine: pack breaking obsolete | Resource pack format has been increased to `73.0`.

entries.message: Item textures were split out of the `blocks` atlas into a separate new `items` atlas. Commands that referenced the `blocks` atlas for item textures now need to reference the `items` atlas instead.
entries.fullLine: atlas breaking | Item textures were split out of the `blocks` atlas into a separate new `items` atlas. Commands that referenced the `blocks` atlas for item textures now need to reference the `items` atlas instead.

entries.message: The `natural` field has been fully replaced by the `gameplay/eyeblossom_open` and `gameplay/creaking_active` Environment Attributes.
entries.fullLine: dimension breaking | The `natural` field has been fully replaced by the `gameplay/eyeblossom_open` and `gameplay/creaking_active` Environment Attributes.

entries.message: The `effects` field has been removed and replaced with `skybox` (rendering type: `none`, `overworld`, or `end`, defaults to `overworld`) and `cardinal_light` (direction of cardinal lighting: `default` or `nether`, defaults to `default`).
entries.fullLine: dimension breaking | The `effects` field has been removed and replaced with `skybox` (rendering type: `none`, `overworld`, or `end`, defaults to `overworld`) and `cardinal_light` (direction of cardinal lighting: `default` or `nether`, defaults to `default`).

entries.message: The `fixed_time` field has been replaced by a `has_fixed_time` boolean that defaults to `false`. Time-based effects are now specified by Environment Attributes.
entries.fullLine: dimension breaking | The `fixed_time` field has been replaced by a `has_fixed_time` boolean that defaults to `false`. Time-based effects are now specified by Environment Attributes.

entries.message: Removed `#without_patrol_spawns` biome tag. Replaced by `gameplay/can_pillager_patrol_spawn` Environment Attribute.
entries.fullLine: tag breaking | Removed `#without_patrol_spawns` biome tag. Replaced by `gameplay/can_pillager_patrol_spawn` Environment Attribute.

entries.message: Item textures were split out of the `blocks` atlas into a separate new `items` atlas that does not have mipmaps. All textures used in an item model must come from the same atlas, and all textures used in a block model must come from the `blocks` atlas.
entries.fullLine: atlas breaking | Item textures were split out of the `blocks` atlas into a separate new `items` atlas that does not have mipmaps. All textures used in an item model must come from the same atlas, and all textures used in a block model must come from the `blocks` atlas.

entries.message: Removed the following enchantment tags: `trades/desert_special`, `trades/jungle_special`, `trades/plains_special`, `trades/savanna_special`, `trades/snow_special`, `trades/swamp_special`, and `trades/taiga_special`.
entries.fullLine: tag enchantment breaking | Removed the following enchantment tags: `trades/desert_special`, `trades/jungle_special`, `trades/plains_special`, `trades/savanna_special`, `trades/snow_special`, `trades/swamp_special`, and `trades/taiga_special`.

entries.message: The `lightmap.fsh` shader was significantly modified. The `LightmapInfo` uniform now has two new fields: `BlockLightTint` and `NightVisionColor`. The `AmbientLightFactor` field was removed. The `DarkenWorldFactor` was renamed to `BossOverlayWorldDarkeningFactor`.
entries.fullLine: shader breaking | The `lightmap.fsh` shader was significantly modified. The `LightmapInfo` uniform now has two new fields: `BlockLightTint` and `NightVisionColor`. The `AmbientLightFactor` field was removed. The `DarkenWorldFactor` was renamed to `BossOverlayWorldDarkeningFactor`.
